result.arabic_text: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ عَادٗا كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّعَادٖ قَوۡمِ هُودٖ
result.translation: 60.ama addunyaa kee Qhiyaamah ayro Yalli isi naqabuu kee isi Racmatak yaxxeereenim ken katayse, oobbiyalDiggah Qaad sinni Rabbil koroositteeh kay farmoytit cinteeh ken dirabbosseh, OobbiyalYallih Racmatak yaxxeereenim kee finqi Nabii Huud mara Qaadal yanay.
